this_title: Long Live TOY - Defending Children's Theatre in the Nickel City
introduction: Long Live TOY profiles the world of a children's theater company located in the 3rd poorest city in the USA. Follow the TOY Company in Buffalo, NY as they lead through their 40Th season in the face of unforeseen local county funding cuts. We watch the inner workings of this devoted theater company as they stay focused to meticulously produce a season of plays that are artistically exciting, innovative in form and style and relevant in content for the children in the community. At the same time, watch as their voice in the funding fight leads the arts community in the funding battle.
chinese_title: Long Live TOY - Defending Children's Theatre in the Nickel City
